name: Contadina® Insalata Minestrone
author: Contadina
summary: The flavors and ingredients from the popular soup were cleverly translated to make this delicious pasta salad--voted as a finalist in the recent Contadina® recipe contest.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Contadina® Petite Diced Tomatoes, drained
1 (15 ounce) can white beans, rinsed and drained
¾ cup diced yellow bell pepper
Salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions
Drain and rinse with cold water
Combine pasta and remaining salad ingredients, except Parmesan cheese, in a large serving bowl
Whisk together dressing ingredients in a small bowl
Pour over salad and mix well
Refrigerate at least 10 minutes for flavors to blend before serving
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired
